name: Make floridastategasprices.com honest
description:
Gas prices are truncated rather than rounded. Prices are always rounded down from point 9 which is mathematically incorrect.

I realize it doesn't bother most folks but it bothers me.

I'm putting this up mostly for my own convenience. It may not work for you. It may not suit you.

Make use of it if you want. Feel free to improve or fix it and share your revisions.
obsoletion_message:
For me this works because I don't frequent pages deeper within the site.
However, it doesn't always work as intended on sub-pages and I don't have the desire, patience or expertise to fix it.
I will likely keep it working for the page I use, which is:
http://www.floridastategasprices.com/Vero_Beach/index.aspx
Which means it will likely continue working for all pages of the form:
http://www.floridastategasprices.com/{city}/index.aspx
